title: Tim Hortons soup now available at select retailers in Canada
text:
Soup’s on!

Tim Hortons is heating up the soup wars in grocery stores.

Canada’s well-known coffee chain has started selling canned versions of their soups and chili at select locations of Sobey’s, Freshco, Shoppers Drug Mart, Save On Foods and Fed Coop across the country.

You can pick up your 540 ml can of Tim Hortons’ Chicken Noodle, Cream of Broccoli or Chicken & Rice for $3.29, or a 398 ml can of Tim Hortons’ Chili for $.379.

Prices may vary by retailer.

The soups went on the market in some stores as early as August.
description: At locations of Sobey’s, Freshco, Shoppers Drug Mart, Save On Foods and Fed Coop across the country
